entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this morning. Risk of freezing rain. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to snow this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
